items.content_html: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.
items.title: JustinMLu/kineval-js: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.

items.content_html: A lightweight, cross platform, multi-[process / thread] framework for building webview HTML5 GUI applications on the desktop. It provides an event driven common service interface covering all service scopes from frontend to backend..
items.title: citkane/webview-bun-app: A lightweight, cross platform, multi-[process / thread] framework for building webview HTML5 GUI applications on the desktop. It provides an event driven common service interface covering all service scopes from frontend to backend..

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library, written in TypeScript, to create isometric projections using SVGs
items.title: elchininet/isometric: A lightweight JavaScript library, written in TypeScript, to create isometric projections using SVGs

items.content_html: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.
items.title: arbasirian/tabulify: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.

items.content_html: Structured Objects is lightweight and powerful library for handling object in JavaScript/TypeScript in different types of data structures.
items.title: luckasnix/structured-objects: Structured Objects is lightweight and powerful library for handling object in JavaScript/TypeScript in different types of data structures.

items.content_html: A lightweight module to construct and parse query parameters of URLs. A set of functions for working with url. Easy to add parameters to url, easy to extract parameters from url. You can also get path from url.
items.title: worka/vanilla-js-url: A lightweight module to construct and parse query parameters of URLs. A set of functions for working with url. Easy to add parameters to url, easy to extract parameters from url. You can also get path from url.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
